title: Death Penalty Expert On Why Lethal Injection Is So Problematic
teaser: In the wake of Arizona's botched execution, Steve Inskeep talks with Amherst professor Austin Sarat, author of the recent book Gruesome Spectacles: Botched Executions and America's Death Penalty.
